properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aakaashamu bhuvilo nella yesu unnathudu manujulu dootalu dayyaalu Yesuku mrokkedaru{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Rakshakudu praanamu bettinadi naa korake veremi vaagwaadambulu akkaraye ledu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Prathi paapi bayamantayu teerchu naamamide narakadandana yantayu tolaginchu naamamu paapa sankellu anniyu vidagottunu Yesu satanu vaani thalanu Yesu chithuka gotten{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapa sankelllu anniyu vidagottunu Yesayu Sathaanu vaani thalanu Yesayu chituku gotten{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paapambulo maraninchedi vaariki pranamidun balaheenamaina atmalaku sakthi nichunu Yesu{/lang-eng}
